channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Cushman & Wakefield’s Michelle MacKay on the advantages of board-to-CEO leaders
item.description: Also: All the news and watercooler chat from Fortune.

item.title: Bernie Sanders Endorses Zohran Mamdani for N.Y.C. Mayor
item.description: Senator Bernie Sanders of Vermont backed Mr. Mamdani, joining Representative Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez in endorsing the front-runner of progressives.

item.title: Former Sen. Bob Mendendez, angling for a pardon for his 11-year prison sentence, says he hopes Trump ‘cleans up the cesspool and restores the integrity to the system’
item.description: Menendez, 71, has been called "Gold Bar Bob" for accepting bribes of gold and cash and acting as an agent of Egypt.

item.title: Russian Drone and Missile Strikes on Kyiv Kill at Least 14
item.description: It was the deadliest attack on the Ukrainian capital in almost a year, and came as Moscow has intensified air assaults on the city.

item.title: Amazon Prime Day 2025 will last an unprecedented four days—and deals include $1 per gallon savings on gas
item.description: Retailer goes big for the 10th anniversary.

item.title: Sarah McBride on Why the Left Lost on Trans Rights
item.description: Representative Sarah McBride reckons with the trans rights movement’s shortcomings, and how to win hearts and minds through a politics of grace.

item.title: One of the hardest jobs in business: Being a ‘sponsor’ that protects rising female execs
item.description: Rosalind Chow writes about the surprising rules of sponsorship in her new book "The Doors You Can Open."

item.title: A new wrinkle for executive comp at BlackRock and Goldman Sachs could become the norm across finance
item.description: Carried interest is no longer just for PE firms.

item.title: Trump Is Daring Us to Impeach Him Again
item.description: There are many legitimate reasons to try Trump a third time. Don’t hold your breath.

item.title: A Senator’s Fall From Grace Ends in a Grim Federal Lockup
item.description: For decades, Robert Menendez, 71, was one of New Jersey’s most influential Democrats. He began serving an 11-year sentence on Tuesday.

item.title: Live Updates: Israel Says It Killed Another Iranian General as Trump Returns to D.C.
item.description: As the fighting entered a fifth day, Israel said it had killed another senior Iranian general. Iran has not commented on the claim, which came as Pres...

item.title: Trump Leaves G7 Early After Tehran Evacuation Warning
item.description: White House officials said the president left the two-day summit early to deal with the escalating conflict between Iran and Israel.

item.title: Russian Drone and Missile Strikes on Kyiv Kill at Least 14
item.description: It was the deadliest attack on the Ukrainian capital in almost a year, and came as Moscow has intensified air assaults on the city.

item.title: Russia Stands Aside as Israel Attacks Iran
item.description: Analysts say the Kremlin is prioritizing its own war against Ukraine, as well as its relations with Gulf nations that don’t want to see a stronger Ira...
